name: Fishing into the depths
description:
In this game you press space to control your hook.

You can also move left and right with "A" and "D".

Avoid the mines, they might blow up your fish! (they also take away 3 points!)

Wait for the fish to come to you to catch them.

Goldfish are worth 1 point each.

Salmon are worth 3 points each!

This game was made for week 93 of the weekly game jam.
